description: Created digital artwork for clients, including commissioned projects and volunteer work.

• Designed UI for multiple game projects.
• Developed concept art for characters, environments, and assets.
• Produced 2D animations.
• Illustrated backgrounds.

• Managed and maintained databases using PostgreSQL and Oracle.
• Automated processes with JavaScript, Python, and VBScript (TestComplete).
• Modeled and optimized business processes using Camunda.
• Developed and maintained C# programs with GitHub version control.
• Performed data analysis and visualization using Microsoft Power BI Desktop.
• Work conducted in English.

• Designed and developed this website to showcase my creative and technical work.
• Use the navigation bar at the top to explore.
• The Portfolio section links to my ArtStation where I share my 2D artwork.
• The 3D section contains printable models I’ve created as a hobby.
• The Games section leads to my itch.io page, featuring games I worked on during 48 hour game jams.
• You can preview my CV by clicking on the CV tab.
